plaintiff.name: Eman Youssef
plaintiff.consumer_status: Individual 'consumer' under FCRA and NY FCRA

defendants.name: EQUIFAX INFORMATION SERVICES LLC
defendants.business_status: Authorized to do business in New York

defendants.name: TRANS UNION LLC
defendants.business_status: Authorized to do business in New York

defendants.name: EXPERIAN INFORMATION SOLUTIONS, INC.
defendants.business_status: Authorized to do business in New York

defendants.name: TD BANK, N.A.
defendants.business_status: Authorized to do business in New York

preliminary_statement: Plaintiff brings this action against the defendants for violations of the Fair Credit Reporting Act and the New York Fair Credit Reporting Act...

factual_background.summary: Plaintiff, a victim of identity theft while traveling abroad, disputed fraudulent charges with defendant TD Bank, who failed to reasonably investigate. The defendant credit reporting agencies subsequently failed to correct her credit reports, leading to significant financial and emotional damages.

causes_of_action.title: FIRST CAUSE OF ACTION: Violation of the FCRA

allegations.description: Failure to conduct reasonable reinvestigations of the plaintiff's disputes.
Failure to review and consider all relevant information submitted by the plaintiff.
Failure to delete or modify inaccurate information after failing to verify it.
Failure to conduct a reasonable investigation after receiving notice of a dispute.
Failure to review all relevant information provided by the credit reporting agencies.

causes_of_action.title: SECOND CAUSE OF ACTION: Violation of the NY FCRA

allegations.description: Including known erroneous information in a credit report.
Failure to delete or modify unverified information.

injunctive_relief: An order requiring defendants to correct the plaintiff's credit report
An order requiring defendants to implement policies to prevent future violations
